original_title: Arte al Agua - los bacaladeros de Terranova
overview: An intimate portrait of the dreams and aspirations of the last fishermen who fished in Newfoundland, their hardships and sufferings. A personal history that will show what life was like on board a trawler, while revealing what went wrong during those years, how and why.
title: Arte al Agua - los bacaladeros de Terranova
